name: OND_Route
description: Returns LH route origin & destination information

origin.description: Enter either the orgin city or orgin country code (e.g 'FRA' or 'DE'). Enter '*' for all

destination.description: Enter either the destination city or country code (e.g 'MAD' or 'ES'). Enter '*' for all

Accept.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

catalogues.description: Carrier for which the OND will be retrieved (e.g. 'LH')

limit.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)

offset.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
